events.title: Meguro River Rd.2🍂
events.meetingPoint: Meguro Station, 西口 West Exit
events.description:
🍂 NetWalking #15: Meguro River! 🍂
📌 October 20th (Mon) @ 12 Noon
📍 目黒駅 Meguro Station, 西口 West Exit
🤝 Meet, Walk, Talk + Charity!

日本語 OK!
Rain or shine!

Hi! I'm Alex!
起業家ですが、同時にパパでもあります👶👧
毎晩子どもたちと一緒にごはんを食べて、寝かしつけたいんです。
I'm an entrepreneur, but I'm also a dad👶👧
I want to be home for dinner & tuck in my kids every night.

だから、よくある夜のネットワーキングイベントはちょっと違う…。
そこで考えたのが、午後のオープンエア版！🍃
Typical after-work networking events aren't for me!
So this is the afternoon, open-air version!🍃

起業家、フリーランス、パパママ仲間たちと出会い、
東京の美しさを感じながら、深い会話を楽しみましょう！
Join us to meet other founders, freelancers, and parents.
Have a meaningful conversation & see the beauty of Tokyo!

Meet at the 西口 West Exit,目黒駅 Meguro Station!
https://maps.app.goo.gl/7wqLsZLx7Y8uv9Te9

events.title: Walking x Atelier Shinkai 🖼️
events.description:
🖼️ NetWalking #14: Walking x Atelier Shinkai
📌 September 8th (Mon) @ 12 Noon
📍 京成曳舟駅 Keisei Hikifune Station, Exit A1
🤝 Meet, Walk, Talk + Vision Board!

Meet at Exit A1, 芝京成曳舟駅 Keisei Hikifune Station!
https://maps.app.goo.gl/c3Z8ss5mN8xKGqEM8
We'll walk to アトリエ 新開 Atelier Shinkai together & try vision boarding!

日本語 OK!

Thanks to the amazing Jennifer Shinkai,
We'll be collaborating & vision boarding!🖼️

I'm all-in on events!
It's cool to explore what NetWalking can become✨

Located at the heart of a cozy 商店街,
Atelier Shinkai is a gallery & community hub

It's too hot to walk 5K in Tokyo Summer,
so when Jennifer reached out for a hybrid
event, it was a natural fit for NetWalking!🙌

So we'll meet at the station,
Walk (and talk) to the atelier,
Do some vision boarding, then walk back!

events.title: Yokohama Bay Walk!🎡

🎡NetWalking #10: Yokohama Bay Walk!🎡
🗓️ May 7th (Wed) @ 12 Noon!
❤️ Charity: ¥100 for each 1KM we walk (Optional!)

Course: Yokohama Bay!
📍 Meet at Minato-Mirai Station, Exit 5
🎡 Explore the iconic Bayside
👟 Walk & talk with cool people

I'm an entrepreneur, but I'm also a dad.
I want to have dinner & tuck in my kids every night.

Typical after-work networking events aren't for me!
After 10+ events, I'm proud to say I'm not the only one🙌

Date: May 7th (Wednesday)
Time: 12:00-2:00PM
Price: FREE
Charity: ¥100 for each 1KM we walk (Optional!)
Meeting Point: Minato-Mirai Station, Exit 5
3 Chome-5 Minatomirai, Nishi Ward, Yokohama, Kanagawa 220-0012

events.title: Rainbow Bridge!🌈
events.description:
🇸🇪 🇯🇵 🇨🇦 🇻🇪 🇬🇧 🇺🇸
17,846: LinkedIn Followers
5,542: Meters Walked
2: Giant Statues 🤖 🗽
¥7,000 : Raised for Charity

[ Glokyo NetWalking 05: Rainbow Bridge ]

Perfect sunny & breezy day☀️
Thank you all for joining the walk!🙏

LinkedIn came in STRONG this time💪

99% of the new people I meet come from here😂
It's really cool to connect people!
(Even though I thought they were already connected😅)

Odaiba is a pretty remote location
So the fact that we could gather 7 professionals
At 12 on a Wed., shows me NetWalks are here to stay!❤️

See you next month!

events.title: Old to New!🏯
events.description:
0: 名刺 (Business cards)
7: Flags 🇳🇿🇩🇪🇮🇳🇦🇺🇧🇪🇫🇷🇺🇸
100,000+: Combined Steps

[ Glokyo NetWalking 3 ]

My philosophy for organizing club events:
Let people be the color in the room🎨

Sure, I decorated & set the time,
But nobody realized the obvious:
The people ARE the event🫵

We're outdoors now, but it's the same!

We walked from Asakusa to Sky Tree🗼
exchanging stories, laughs, & inspiration
(not business cards!)

Then everyone exchanged contacts and
made plans to hang out individually🤝
Real people. Real connections.

Thanks so much for coming!

events.title: Yoyogi Walk🍂
events.description:
🤝 10 total strangers
🌍 7 different countries
🚶 2+ laps around Yoyogi park
💖 ¥44300 raised for the Noto Earthquake

Thank you all for the INCREDIBLE afternoon!🙏 

What started as a random anti-忘年会 idea, 
Became a real fun, meaningful, and impactful event. 

This is definitely becoming a regular thing! 

Couple takeaways:
- Walk + Talk + 🌞 is a winning combo
- NOTHING beats meeting face-to-face 
- This is exactly the community I've been looking for 
- Don't assume everyone on LinkedIn knows each other😅
